ygData.subject: RE: everything
ygData.msgSnippet: ... in all Norrath. ... Hey, *I* voted for dark elves!  :-)  Like em so much I play 3 of em (sisters) and the dark elf males leave us alone, for the most
ygData.messageBody:
>And according to Allakhazam's Poll, wood elf women were voted the most sexy
in all Norrath.
> Kitasi

Hey, *I* voted for dark elves! :-) Like em so much I play 3 of 'em
(sisters) and the dark elf males leave us alone, for the most part. Must be
you faeries... ;-)

Family X'Ris
Briza & Sinafay & Veithae Tinlin, Margrete
Cleric . SK . Wizard woodbard warrior of Halas
Fennin RO Rallos ZEK
(and too many more)

> Wood Elf Druids are NOT cuter than High Elf Clerics.
> Miriana Windryder, Lvl 50 HIGH ELF Cleric

Cuter, bah! How will that help you strike fear into your enemies hearts?

>I know what you mean, I started my Bard near release, and I spent the first
12 levels of my life trying to cover my arse......... Much to the dismay of
my male counterparts
>Jaezebel

Dark elf female PW has the ass CUT OUT! Come ON! Its ridiculous!

> "Dorn D'Brynn flees in terror"
> Priceless. :-)
>John H. Kim

Leave Dorn alone!

>The Lizard Scout Fifes are rumoured to be non-magical wind instruments, but
this still remains to be proven.
>Talies the Wanderer, Moderator
I let a bard passing through Feerot try one, he said it didn't work. Is it
an instrument? I have one to give away, if anyone promises to worship
Innoruuk.

>There IS a place in the realm for half-elves!!!
>Sylly

Nope. None. Unless I desire a rare treat.. yum!

<sarcasm> P.S. I love being a newbie! </sarcasm>

PPS. Twinking is a reality of my life. You see, sisters give things to each
other. Of course, we'd probably kill that bard on sight.. (look, I can RP by
myself! :) BUT -- think about how it makes the REAL newbies feel. They are
stuck with cloth, and you have your chintin shield, blackened armor.. sure
they don't know the stats, but they sure don't feel good. Half the people I
group with are twinks, it seems.

PPS Looking for a guild for my bard! Can't compose, so I guess Soerbaird is
out..

PPS. Don't you wish EQ was so realistic that you could assume any confusing
things were a result of you not understanding? As in,
<www.marathon.org/story/>
